column4: My monitor is stuck at 600x800 even though the specs say it can do 1280 x 1024 -- can you help?
To help with that problem, we need to know what the brand of your video chipset is, e.g. nVidia, ATI, Trident etc.
My video card: 01:00.0 VGA compatible controller: VIA Technologies, Inc. KM400/KN400/P4M800 [S3 UniChrome] (rev 01)]
